org.livingdoc.converters

Class TypeConverterManager

  • org.livingdoc.converters.TypeConverterManager

  • public class TypeConverterManager

    This object manages interface TypeConverter instances. It has two responsibilities:

    1. load and manage default type converters provided by LivingDoc

    2. create and cache instances of (custom) type converters

    See Also:
    interface TypeConverter

    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCE

        public static TypeConverterManager INSTANCE

        This object manages interface TypeConverter instances. It has two responsibilities:

        1. load and manage default type converters provided by LivingDoc

        2. create and cache instances of (custom) type converters

        See Also:
        interface TypeConverter

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        @NotNull
public TypeConverter<?> getInstance(@NotNull
                                             kotlin.reflect.KClass<? extends org.livingdoc.api.conversion.TypeConverter<? extends java.lang.Object>> converterType)

        Returns an instance of the given interface TypeConverter class. Instances are created lazily and then cached. Repeated invocations of this method will always return the same instance.

        Parameters:
        converterType - the class of the type converter
        Returns:
        the type converter instance for the given type
        See Also:
        interface TypeConverter

      • getDefaultConverters

        @NotNull
public java.util.List<org.livingdoc.api.conversion.TypeConverter> getDefaultConverters()

        Returns the list of LivingDoc's default type converters.
